title: UK Science and Innovation Country Snapshots

collection_groups.title: Middle East, Africa and South Asia

details.body: The Science and Innovation Network Country Snapshots provide information on the local Science and Innovation landscape, UK priorities and successes. Each one offers a snapshot of information under the headings: Science & Innovation Landscape; UK Science & Innovation, and Science and Innovation Network recent success stories and future activities. There is also a list of Science and Innovation Network contacts for further enquiries.

description: A collection of introductory briefs from the UK Science and Innovation Network.
